title: Mayfair Antimicrobial Toilet Seat
transcripts:
Antimicrobial Toilet Seat

The Antimicrobial duraguard finish on this solid plastic seat helps prevent growth of odor causing bacteria, fungi, molds and mildew. Features patented Easy 2 Hinge Technology with lift-off hinges for easy cleaning and quiet slow-close action to eliminate slamming. Measures 14" x 15 1/2" x 2 1/2". One year warranty.

In the next few seconds, youll see why a toilet seat with Easy 2 from Westport is twice as nice as an average seat.

Easy 2 from Westport improves your bathroom in two ways.  By removing quickly with a twist and a lift for cleaning or replacement.  And by closing itself, slowly and gracefully with a just the tap of a finger.

To lift the seat off for cleaning, simply twist the hinges to the unlocked position, so you can thoroughly clean and disinfect one of the toughest areas in your bathroom to clean.

The Easy 2 Slow-Close feature lowers the seat smoothly, quietly, and gracefully with just a light tap.  Theres no need to touch the unsanitary underside.  Even a small child can close it with no pinched fingers.  What a nice way to encourage everyone to close the seat, keeping your bathroom neater and more attractive.

The seat itself is thoroughly Westport quality.  Proudly crafted in the U.S.A. in both round and elongated sizes with a durable finish that cleans easily and stays cleaner.

Isnt it time to make a few of the little things in life just a little bit easier?  And thats why we created Easy 2.  Another innovation from Westport.
